Edges-Weird -- Male Avion Legendary Adventurer
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes: Liquid Courage: Drinking alcohol gives +1 Vigor step, -1 Smarts and Agility for 1 hr
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d10 Healing: (sma) d4+2 Persuasion: (spi) d4-3
Battle: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Language (Avion): (sma) d8 Taunt: (sma) d6
Fighting: (agi) d10 Notice: (sma) d6
Skill Notes:
Healer: +2 Healing
Keen Senses (Avion): +1 Notice step
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Ugly+: -2 Persuasion
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise), gain -2 Notice roll in circumstances not usually subject to Notice
Flight: Uses Athletics for flight maneuvers
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 20; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (11 points): Beast Bond; Beast Master; Champion; Chi; Danger Sense; Healer; Liquid Courage; Luck; Martial Artist; Martial Warrior; Scavenger Hindrances: Cautious; Mean; Ugly+ Avion Features: Can't Swim; Flight; Frail; Keen Senses (Avion); Reduced Pace
Feature Notes:
Beast Bond: Spend Bennies on companion animals
Beast Master: Has animal companion, other animals will not attack first
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Luck: +1 Benny each session
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Combat
Toughness: 10 (3) Parry: 5 (3) Cover: -4 Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Bronze Corselet Shield: Ballistic Shield Weapons: Dagger: 1 (+0 d4+d8 R3'); Gatling Gun: 1 (+0 2d8 R24'); Long Bow: 1 (+0 2d6 R15'); Unarmed: 1 (+2 d8+d8)
Combat Notes:
Frail: -1 Toughness
Martial Artist: +2 Unarmed attack/+2 Unarmed damage step
Martial Warrior: Increased Martial Artist effects
Reduced Pace: -1 Pace/-1 Run step
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Can't Swim: Move 1/3 speed through water
Champion: +2 damage vs. opposite alignment
Chi: Reroll failed attack, force foe attack reroll, or gain +d6 natural damage 1/encounter
Flight: Fly Pace 12
Scavenger: Recover knowledge or equipment 1/encounter
